thread.title: Mariann Kerr

author: Mariann Kerr
title: Mariann Kerr
text:
It was such a pleasure working with Marcus Johnson at webuyanycar.com
when I called to make the appointment he was pleasant and courteous. He called back to confirm the appointment. When arriving he came right out to greet us with a big smile like he knew us forever. We were offered coffee or water and a snack bar. He then explained every step of the way what he was doing during the entire transaction. I wish every place of business had a Marcus Johnson working for them . I told him when leaving that I would tell anyone looking to sell their car that they should go and see him. if I could I would give him 10 stars
